title: Does the job
review:
As always.. iPhone is iPhone..

Using about 1year and more..

It is 4g- only internet can be used, no volte ( cannot able to call)
Moderate battery life
Good camera quality both front and rear

Nothing to tell something new.. it's a iPhone so u obviously have very limited apps, no storage capacity only 8gb will be available in 16gb model but that 8gb also will get disappeared no one knows how and why.. once it got broken Ur mobile u have to sell some of Ur property and u can resolve it with Apple Service..

So if u r buying a iPhone 5s then it's clear Ur budget will be around 15k and u will sell something and make it up to 20k and buy a iPhone 5s..
If Ur budget will be around 25k then u prefer a 30k iPhone 6 16gb.. and this budget plan will goes on, no more changes.. if u can offer 80k then u will buy a 1lakh iPhone 7s plus or something buy making some loan or selling Ur property or who knows u may sell Ur kidney as well.. 
Once it fall down badly or get into some problem, don't worry Apple Service support is there.. simply go to a Apple Service centre they will exchange Ur old broken mobile with completely new one.. a brand new one.. in exchange u only have to give Ur another kidney or liver or heart or brain as well, if u have some million worth property it can be a good offer, if u don't have any of these don't worry, just sell Ur friend's kidney who uses Ur iPhone for gaming. Problem solved.. now u can start it again... A normal iPhone users life..

title: Good Phone with worst battery life
review: Phone is awesome but I think it has worst battery life. In a morning when I get out with Battery full and click some photos (30-40) and shoot some videos (9-10 of about 6 mins), my battery is completely drained. I have carry power bank with greater mAh always with me if I am on holidays. Can't recommend this phone to anyone.

title: Iphone 5S review
review:
Well the iPhone 5S is here ! its the best iPhone today ! but is it up to the mark ? Well Yes ! 

Short Review :-

Build quality !
The iPhone 5S comes with the same look and feel as the last years iPhone . The screen is the same Although there is a fingerprint scanner in the front now ! also knows as touch ID !

Camera:- The camera has been bumped Amazingly ! Although 8mp like the last year ! the iPhone 5s now has a larger sensor and aperture tat it captures stunning pictures ! And the dual coloured led flash makes Photos look even More dramatic !

Speed:- Amazingly Powerfull ! Many people look at the specs and decide which phone is fast but tat is utterly wrong! The iPhone 5s Beats the galaxy S4 and the xperia Z1 in terms of processing andf graphic speed ! Test dreived by benchmarking apps like *Geekbench3**Antutu*3D max*

Verdict ! 
Yhe iPhone is definitely amazing with its 64 bit A7 processor Along with the M7 co-processor ! The better camera And the touch ID
Well how does so much come from a phone tats just 112 gms and so damn Sleek ? Well tats Apple :)

title: Great Deal!!
review:
Rs.20499 with 10% cash back, super awesome deal!!! landed cost around 18750 cannot be matched by anyone. phone looks good. checked for product registration and full 365 days warranty available unlike few who  have complained that they received used product. Manufacturing date is also of November 15. But was not update to latest version of IOS.  Got it upgraded to IOS 9.2 immediately on startup. 

Delivered well before time. packing was OK,I would say. I think flipkart was relying more on the product's internal packing itself.

Was available in local market for Rs.27500 and they were trying to  convince that the online versions are not real. Got a bill with taxes paid, so I think there will not be any issue with the warranty either. Migrating from android to IOS has its own learning curve. Hope the experience is good ,  Have tried IOS after a lot of deliberation

title: The Best device with an Outstanding OS !!!
review:
I Ordered this phone on big billion sale for Rs.18499 by Monday midnight and the price was dropped to Rs. 17,799 by morning.

But the seller has gifted the difference 700rs to my wallet , so i have placed an another order in it.

Thank you Flipkart and Supercom.net seller.

Now coming to the phone.

I was using android for over 7 years and Trust me guys after using iOS, i understand that we should not compare android with iPhone.

iPhone is an iPhone - Cant compare it with others. (Please use it to feel)

Camera - It was amazing, with the 8mp you can get the DSLR charities.

iOS - Very smooth and user friendly, and the best secure based OS. (You don't need to worry about your data even if you lost the phone, everything will be synced with icloud and no one can access it without the pass code)

Battery backup  is good, we can manage it for a day use. (Social networking, Games, Calls and chats)

You'll addicted to iOS when you start using it.

And now it comes with a deal price in Flipkart, so go for it without hesitation.

Apple iPhone 5s - Classy looks with the Best OS.

Personally i feel why i missed this for this long!!!  

Cheers,
Jonam

title: Highly recommended
review:
Nice Phone in nice range @ 16050/-

Got in time.
Was properly packed.
Got it at only Rs. 16050/- in a deal.

Handy as it is of 4 inch screen.
NO LAG as expected from iPhone.
Awesome touch response.
Display is really nice.

CAMERA quality is so nice though the rear camera is 8MP. Image originality is just perfect. The image quality is as u see in bare eyes and no 8MP camera of any android can provide that.
Good optical image stabilization.
Nice slow motion camera.
Specially the FRONT CAMERA is only 1.2 MP but I can assure everyone that its better than 5 MP of android and windows.

The battery is nice for me as I use it moderately. Easily last for 1day. No android phone's battery will last for 1day after using internet connection, WiFi, games and other usage when the battery capacity is only 1500mah.

Its a nice experience to switch from android from iOS.

title: Purchased iphone 5s fantastic performance.
review:
I got this phone on 13 Nov 2015 and till now it is better to give a review. I got this at 26200/-. I brought this iphone 5s(space grey) as i got the manufactured october 2015 version and inbuilt ios 9.0 which is fluidic and superb performance.
Gaming is superb and battery lasts a day long for average users. 
Camera is 8 MP is the best part in iphone 5s. stunning photos and front camera is as equivalent to 5MP compared with other phones.
I upgraded to ios 9.1 and its still working fast and fluidic. 
Touch ID feature is unique and can give you a different way of security and privacy.
Music in headphones are clearly fantastic. Overall fantastic performance and should buy this definitely. the price is also down now. 
Must go for it guys.

title: Once Bitten, Twice Shy!!
review:
Hi Flipkart.

I had a while/silver iPhone 5S before this which I sold last month and got this space grey one and intend to keep the same till iPhone 6 is back in all awe & glory. I always liked how uniform the screen looked when the phone is switched off and lying beside me when I'm busy with some actual work, far from any distraction due to contrasting white and black. 

The one piece I received had two issues and it prompted me to return-

1) Two tiny black spots were visible against a white background in apps like "notes"; possibly some dust particles had found their way into the screen
2) The phone's aluminium frame was bent, starting from the (-) volume button and upwards. It literally threw me off and I was damn pissed. It is also bizarre how it left the assembly line and the final check!!

Anyway, the Flipkart guys were very helpful, I got a call back the same day and they did arrange the replacement. In two days I got a new one free of defects. I hope Apple does improve its in-process quality control.

I was this close in snapping buying electronics from Flipkart; but their through professionalism in addressing the issue and making good of the problem surely speaks of their character. Tell you what, I will stick to them.

Thanks guys.

About the phone, you know it, I know it; it's the best out there...

Cheers,
Jagannath.

review:
The world is just mad at apple products without any knowledge of technology. I wish there was an option for zero star.
1. Does not pair with any phone over Bluetooth.
2. Call quality is like a dirt grade mobile. When we put on the speaker, it just gives lot of noise similar to white noise in radio.
3. In areas where I used to get proper range and talk  well with my Moto Turbo, I don't even get range with this product.
4. Hardly noticed any difference when updated from iOS9 to iOS10.

This is just a piece of polished 'BRICK'

Blackberry and Motorola were way better.
One thing is for sure, anyone who has an apple product definitely has money, but no guarantee of technical knowledge.

Apple should stop making phones and get into the business of jewellery. That atleast makes sense for non-technical expensive 'BRICKS'.

title: A superb phone!!!
review:
Bought this phone on big billion sale day. A super fast delivery by flipkart and a great seller Supercom.net who gave me 700 rs giftcard. 

Now coming to the phone!!!

Pros:
A super phone with awesome design, fits perfectly in hand and a lag free device. Battery backup is good, lasts for a day with moderate use. One great thing about battery backup is your OS won't eat up your battery if not in use, it manages everything perfectly. It fully charges in 1-1.30 hrs from 0-5% battery. All your data is fully secured, perfectly smooth finger print scanner. A great and flawless rear and front camera which gives me clear images. Speakers are good and gives a great experience when headphones are plugged in.

Cons: 
Phone heats up if you operate during charging


 Writing this review after using it for 10 days.

Over all I would say a Perfect Phone!!!

Thanks!!!

title: For Apple Haters
review:
For all new Apple users and Apple haters every Apple user knows that Apple's battery sucks up a lot faster than any phones. But everyone must accept the fact that it also charges up a hell lot faster than any other phone.
It's performance is the best in 1GB RAM range and its compatible of defeating any phone with 2GB RAM under 30k. 
People who think that why should they buy a phone with a Secondary Camera of 8MP but guys it's not the megapixel that matters in a phone camera. The thing that matters is apperture and Iphone 5S gives a 8MP camera with f/2.2 apperture and a 13MP camera under 25k gives f/2.0 apperture so its the best in its range. And everybody knows that apple has the best slow motion captures in comaprison to any phone.
And many people think that a 4-Inch phone is not so cool and eye catching in 2016. Though it's somewhat correct but people have to accept that it's very easy to reach every corner of tge screen with one hand which js not lossible in a 5.5-Inch smartphone.
In short the phone is the BEST and the BEAST in its range and it's still one of the best smartphones in 2016 also .

title: Iphone No longer worth the money
review:
Apple was once known to be an innovating company in terms of design and tech in their products.That name is now all but gone now a days.
Iphone 5S is yet another eg of the company who can no longer really innovate.What does this have for it to be priced at Rs.53K that too for the 16GB verson (32 GB is 62K).Lets take each feature and component of the phone and do a comparison with the competition.

Camera 
This is one of the most used part of a smart phone.Apple itself has prided in its cameras and advertised it well but the fact remains Iphone camera has NEVER been the best in Market and this is espeacialy visible in this current gen.Smartphone cameras of other phones esp Nokia Lumia 1020 are MILES ahead of iPHONE 5s camera in almost every aspect.This includes Optical Image Stabilization,Losseless Zoom,Over sampeling,focusing after photo has been taken,RAW digital negatives are some of the features iPhone 5S doesn't have and Lumia 1020 has and these features amount to a lot in normal everyday use.iphone camera's night or low light performance is poor when compared with the 41MP monster sitting on Lumia 1020. 
Microphones
Sorry Apple Nokia beat you again in this area. Search online for HAAC Microphones by Nokia and you will what an amazing piece of technology and  innovation its.

Navigation Software,Map application.
The default map application in IOS 7 is the Apple's Own Apple Maps.If you don’t know this remains the worst Map software among its competition which includes Google Maps(default in Android),Here(Nokia)Maps(default in all Nokia smartphones,Jolla and Kindle Android also used by 4 out of 5 cars with GPS) bing Maps ( default in non lumia Win Phones).Apple Maps has been notorious for its innacurate data which has lead people to drive straight to Airport runways.You will however get Google Maps and Here Maps in App store but Apple maps will remain as your default map app.

Design
Nothing much has change from Iphone 5 and 4S.Its allmost  same itself.

Screen
Apple screen is one of the best in Market but it remains a bit small.I am not a Fan of big screen but the screen can be bumped to 4.3 which is sweet spot.

Processor.
Processor is Apple's proprietery A7 which gives fast performance thanks to good OS optimisation.This  is a plus when compared with Android but not so much when comparing Win Phone whose low end phones like  Lumia 520 is comparable with Galaxy S3.Being 64 bit doesn't serve any purpose as no apps are now made for 64 bit.By the time they make you will be throwing away this phone after long use.

Overall
Buying this makes little practical sense esp at this price. There are amazing products from other manufacturers which offer better phones at cheaper price. Phones like Lumia 1020,HTC One,LG G2 each of which has innovating features and DOUBLE the memory.Only truly ignorant people buys Iphones by their choice.This fact is high lighted by the high market share iPhone  enjoys in US and we know the level of ignorance  Americans have (not all Americans I mean).

title: Fantastic Smartphone Just Buy it
review:
Thanks to Flipkart and WS Retail.
I replaced my 2 year old nexus 5 (32GB) phone with this iphone5S in replacement offer from flipkart. So I received this iPhone from WS Retail in Original Apple iPhone Packaging.All accessories are Brand new including iPhone Device. I crossed checked warranty of this product by entering the serial number of device and confirmed online that phone is having 1 year validity. I called to Apple iPhone customer executive and given the serial and IMEI number of device to certify authenticity of product, and got to know from Apple that received product is genuine brand new iPhone.
I been using this iphone for last 20 days with no issues. Charger I got along with this iPhone is good,it charges the iphone to 100% in 1 hour. And I use phone moderately whole day to play music, watch videos, messaging,calling and other stuff. So battery backup comes for about 10 -11 hour. So I believe its fair and nice battery backup. Earphones of this iPhone 5s are Awesome , I am sure for every music lover it gives TOP NOTCH BEATS as in like you are inside Sound composing studio..!!. I do have have On-Ear Bose headphones and I been using Bose headphones for 2 years from now, I wanted to know you that iPhone5S  headphones are equally Superb like Bose. I know you cannot compare Bose headphone with iPHONE earphone, but I experienced beats to some extent.. like BOSE..! headphone. iPhone5S is complete product, I am completely satisfied.iPhone 5S screen is small, But Im not big fan of large screen. I believe smart phone should like perfectly handheld Smartphone So iPhone 5S serve its purpose with 5 star.. Video I shooted with this device is really good with crisp and clear 1080P HD motion picture. This smartphone has 8MP lens, Still Pics are nice with good details.As I use DSLR, I am not fan of smartphone camera since all smartphones except iPhone6S have small sensor motor which cannot capture details. Finally as you know Use and Feel of Iphones are always great. IPhone5S has Siri(Voice recognition) feature which lets you read your E-mail ,play music , navigate places and many stuffs with handsfree, and this phone takes your thumb impression to unlock ,all these features makes phone  a smartphone..!! My last word.. to all buyers that, Buying iPhone from Flipkart online, I made NO MISTAKE..!! and I'm truely Satisfied. Even if you go to Apple store and buy,you get same product by spending 3K or 4K more..!! .  I got 5K discount for exchanging my old Nexus 5(which I used for 2 years extensively) and bought iPhone 5S for 18,900/- only.

title: Great Product, Trusted Online Dealings
review:
I was really looking forward to own an iPhone for last 2-3 years & Flipkart helped me to make that dream to a reality in the form of an iPhone 5S Spac-e Grey 16 GB  (Model A-1530). 

This is really a stunning piece of creation & I was amazed by the kind of discounts offered by Flipkart & WS Retail for such a flagship product from Apple. 

The product was safely delivered as "manufacturer box packed iPhone" double packed inside Flipkart's own box along with Credit Card swiping facility while taking the delivery at my doorstep (COD). 

As indicated by their website, the product was 100% new & genuine &  Apple India's domestic service warranty (1Year) has started as soon as I activated my phone. Since apple products need activation using a SIM, you can make out the status by checking the activation status of its IMEI with Apple website, immediately after Flipkart prepares the invoice. 

The new iCloud storage of 5GB (free with iPhone) helped me to seamlessly transfer all my contacts from my old Android phone to the new iPhone. 

My overall experience for the shopping experience with Flipkart, their back end partner WS Retail & the logistics partner Ekart Logistics are Simply Superb... Please keep it up guys...
